product_name: SIGMA SPORT BC8.12 ATS Wireless Bike Computer - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Simple to operate and easy to see while riding, the wireless BC8.12 ATS features cycling functions such as average speed, maximum speed, and total trip time to deliver information while you train.
short_description: Simple to operate and easy to see while riding, the wireless BC8.12 ATS features cycling functions such as average speed, maximum speed, and total trip time to deliver information while you train.
